page.title: 09I live on a Caravan Site.
page.content: I live on a caravan site which my parents own.We have 6 acres of land and one hundred vans on the site.They don't belong to us they are all privately owned.We have a 2 acre playing field with a swing and seesaw.We have a small shop which my mum runs.The vans are static,but we can also have eighteen touring vans.We open in March and close in October. In the close season you can only come for day trips because of the snow.It gets a bit boring sometimes in the week because there is hardly any one around.We have a van on the site called the Mother's Union van which people in the group can come and stay in for a few weeks.All the vans have a number and a letter like b5 or d7 so they can be found easily.People on our site go fishing,walking,boating or they sunbathe.
